name: ARROWSCAPE
description:
ARROWSCAPE is a top down arcade action game where you play as an arrow in a labyrinth and need to reach the exit by pressing pink switches and avoiding red obstacles. 

Very simple, but not very easy. Heavily inspired by the hacking minigame in NieR:Automata. Dash your way through the 3 available levels and try to get the fastest time and the fewest deaths. 

This was a project i worked on for only a few weeks for my studies, and as a result the game is still very early in development. I am planning on adding a fourth level as well as some extra features, such as a local  high scores screen, or tweaking around the dash, cause it feels wonky at times.

Feedback is greatly appreciated. Have fun and feel free to share your scores. 

(note : the music in the trailer isn't in the game, it's from Touhou 17.5)
